modules.description: Provides functions to transform expressions using monadic binding and zero handling, expanding syntax for custom operators. Works with OCaml AST expressions and context-aware rules for code manipulation. Enables custom parsing and transformation of monadic workflows in generated code.

Provides a `%bind` syntax to simplify monadic operations, allowing seamless integration of monadic workflows into OCaml code. Works with monadic types such as `option`, `result`, and custom monads defined with `let%bind` and `let%map`. Enables cleaner handling of sequential computations in effectful or error-prone code, such as parsing or I/O operations.

Transforms OCaml AST expressions using monadic binding and zero handling, supporting custom operator syntax and context-aware code manipulation. Processes monadic workflows by applying transformation rules to generate structured, executable code. Supports operations like bind, return, and zero handling, enabling custom parsing and code generation. Examples include flattening nested monadic operations, injecting custom error handling, and rewriting expressions for improved readability or performance.
